UCDSystem - Class in business
UCD System represents the System Component of a Use Case Diagram.
UCDSystem() - Constructor for class business.UCDSystem
Constructs a UCDSystem with default values.
UCDSystem(String, Point, int, int) - Constructor for class business.UCDSystem
Constructs a UCDSystem with specified name, position, width, and height.
ui - package ui

Constructs a new UMLCanvas and initializes necessary fields.
UMLCanvas() - Constructor for class ui.UseCaseDiagramUI.UMLCanvas
Constructs a new UMLCanvas, initializing mouse listeners to handle component interactions.

Represents an arrow in a UML use case diagram.

Constructs a UseCaseArrow with default values.
UseCaseArrow(String, String, Point, Point) - Constructor for class business.UseCaseArrow

UseCaseDiagram - Class in business
Represents a Use Case Diagram in a UML diagramming application.
UseCaseDiagram() - Constructor for class business.UseCaseDiagram
 
UseCaseDiagramUI - Class in ui
The UseCaseDiagramUI class represents the user interface for designing UML Use Case Diagrams.
UseCaseDiagramUI() - Constructor for class ui.UseCaseDiagramUI
Constructs the UseCaseDiagramUI and initializes the user interface components.
UseCaseDiagramUI.SamplesPanel - Class in ui
The SamplesPanel class represents a side panel that displays static UML samples (e.g., Use Case, Actor, System, etc.) and allows users to create these components on a linked UseCaseDiagramUI.UMLCanvas by clicking on the samples.
UseCaseDiagramUI.UMLCanvas - Class in ui
The UMLCanvas class represents a custom JPanel for drawing and interacting with UML components such as Use Cases, Actors, Systems, and connecting lines (arrows).
UseCaseDiagramUI.UMLComponent - Class in ui
The UMLComponent class represents a component in a UML diagram.
